text: The Drosophila guarani species group is a lineage of vinegar fly in the Immigrans-tripunctata radiation of the subgenus Drosophila first proposed by Dobzhansky & Pavan (1943). At least 24 species have been described, distributed throughout latin america. == Disambiguation == The species group has been referred to as "Drosophila guarnini." ==References== Category:Drosophila Category:Insect species groups
title: Guarani species group
